name: puter
description: Puter is a self-hosted browser-based desktop environment that simulates a full operating system in the browser. It includes a virtual file system, apps, terminal, desktop, and multi-user support.
features: Browser-based desktop: Access a full desktop environment through any web browser without installation.
Virtual file system: Store and organize files in a cloud-like file system with folders and permissions.
Built-in applications: Use pre-installed apps including text editor, terminal, file manager, and media player.
Terminal access: Execute commands in a web-based terminal with support for common Unix utilities.
Multi-user support: Create separate user accounts with isolated environments and file storage.
App marketplace: Install additional applications and tools from a curated marketplace.
File sharing: Share files and folders with other users or generate public download links.
Drag-and-drop interface: Manage files and windows with familiar desktop interactions.
Customizable desktop: Personalize wallpapers, themes, and desktop layouts to match preferences.
Real-time collaboration: Work on files simultaneously with other users in shared workspaces.
API access: Build custom applications that integrate with the Puter environment and file system.
Mobile responsive: Access your desktop environment from tablets and smartphones with touch optimization.
